>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.qIIoypmTFypnmRer]{Evolutionist Adaption}

As a reaction when you spend 2 or more MP to use an adaptation, you can use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i]{Intimidate} to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#demoralize]{demoralize} a creature within 30 feet. If you have spent 4 or more MP since the end of your last turn when you activate this adaptation, you can either attempt to demoralize up to two additional creatures or you can cause a creature you successfully demoralized to also become @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{frightened} for 1 round (Will negates the frightened effect).
